awards.title: UH Mānoa Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of at least 3.8 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: UH Mānoa Dean's List
awards.summary: Recognizes students who completed each semester with a minimum GPA of 3.5.

awards.title: US Japan Bridging Scholarship
awards.summary: $4,000 scholarship awarded to roughly 80 out of 300 applicants across the US for the purpose of studying abroad in Japan.
